subject: Consecration
text:
The Twilight to my Star,
Her hoary head
A Hope receding far,
To Life re-led.
Apart and poor I lay;
My fevered frame
Slow withering away,
When soft she came,
From comfort, to my care;
And Pity sweet
Subdued her, kneeling there,
To kiss my feet.
A Magdalen adored
Her God in Thee:-
A greater love, O Lord,
Anointed me.
